package.name: Coolbooter
package.shortDescription: Tether downgrade any device to any version!

descriptionlist.description: CoolBooter is an all-in-one dual booting utility for jailbroken 32 bit iOS devices.
Make sure to backup any files you are not willing to loose, I and the author will not be held responsible for data loss, you have been warned

screenshot.description: This is a description for screenshot 2. It's another Cydia!
